name: Service Installation with Suspicious Folder Pattern
description: Detects service installation with suspicious folder patterns
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND (winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045) AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/[Cc]:\\[Pp]rogram[Dd]ata\\.{1,9}\.exe.*/ OR winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/[Cc]:\\.{1,9}\.exe.*/))`
